ygData.subject: Re: Using the Lament song + a minor rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn wrote:  ... The group leader is there for many reasons.  One of those is to, surprise of surprises, lead the group.  If
ygData.messageBody:
"Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" wrote:
<snip>
> He created a lot of needless
> downtime by his actions. Any other recommendation other than finding a
> different group to adventure with?

The group leader is there for many reasons. One of those is to,
surprise of surprises, lead the group. If somebody in the group
isn't 'towing the pary line' ;) then it is the responsibility of
the group leader to rectify that situation. If that means that
person is to be ejected from the group, so be it.

The fact that you were right (IMHO) and the mage was wrong has
nothing to do with it. If the party cannot agree to tactics,
whatever they may be, then the party will not be effective.

Rocket
